channel.title: How do i see my cords on a dementhuim 637/639
channel.description: ive been looking on here of a better part of 4 hrs on how i can see my x cords and y cords soo i can move npc's and found zip can someone point me in the right direction

item.title: How do i see my cords on a dementhuim 637/639
item.dc:creator: @holylouis holylouis
item.description:
@holylouis wrote:

I are ready figured it out last night.there was 2 different codes for all shop npcs,which i found the op npc and moved them and didn’t realize there was 2 codes for all of them til Amy told me to go check if there’s 1 or more location for the npc. thanks tho for the advise greatly appreciated

Read full topic

item.title: How do i see my cords on a dementhuim 637/639
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Just go through files… Wont remove old one, but will move it to new location.

item.title: How do i see my cords on a dementhuim 637/639
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

This should work:

if (command[0].equals("coords")) { player.sendMessage("Current Coords: X: " + player.getLocation().getX()+ " Y: " + player.getLocation().getY()+" Z: "+player.getLocation().getZ()); }

Read full topic
